title:
How can one find out how much money has been collected by the various fund raisers who collect for certain drives on television or over the www and where does this money go?



Is there any rules for disposing of the funds?
text:
Most nonprofit organizations have to file reports with the IRS to
show where they get money and how they spend it. Those reports are
public records.



Here are links to a couple of articles that will help to answer your
questions:
